hero.title: Connecting Voices, Building Communities
hero.description: Create vibrant spaces where conversations flow naturally and every voice matters. Host dynamic events that bring people together.

community.title: Community Spaces
community.description: Create and join virtual spaces where your community can gather, interact, and build lasting connections.

events.title: Virtual Events
events.description: Host immersive virtual events with real-time interaction, custom branding, analytics, and seamless attendee management.

audio.title: Audio Calls
audio.description: Crystal-clear audio calls with spatial audio technology for natural conversations and group discussions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your community up and running in three simple steps

discover.title: Find Your Space
discover.description: Join existing communities or create your own space. Whether you're hosting virtual, hybrid, or in-person events, tailor the experience to your audience.

discovery.title: Smart Discovery
discovery.content: Find events and communities that match your interests through our AI-powered recommendation system.

types.title: Community Types
types.content: Choose between free or premium communities. Create exclusive paid memberships or keep it open for everyone.

formats.title: Flexible Formats
formats.content: Host virtual, hybrid, or in-person events. Perfect for workshops, meetups, conferences, or casual gatherings.

profile.title: Profile Building
profile.content: Craft your personal or brand profile, highlight your social links, and build a following.

engage.title: Engage & Connect
engage.description: Foster meaningful interactions through event-specific chat, media sharing, and collaborative features. Every voice contributes to the community.

audio.title: Audio Spaces
audio.content: Host crystal-clear audio conversations with spatial audio technology. Perfect for panels, discussions, and community gatherings.

interactive.title: Interactive Features
interactive.content: Share photos from events, create polls, start discussions, and enable real-time chat. Built-in tools for Q&A sessions and breakout rooms.

management.title: Community Management
management.content: Add co-hosts and moderators, set custom roles, and manage permissions. Create event-specific chat rooms for focused discussions.

engagement.title: Engagement Tools
engagement.content: Use built-in features for networking, mentoring, and collaboration. Create ice-breakers and facilitate meaningful connections.

manage.title: Manage Events
manage.description: Create ticketed or free events with powerful tools for guest lists, promo codes, and analytics.

ticketing.title: Advanced Ticketing
ticketing.content: Create multiple ticket tiers, early bird specials, and VIP passes. Set up waitlists, approval processes, and custom registration forms.

promotional.title: Promotional Tools
promotional.content: Generate custom tracking links, create discount codes, and run referral programs. Import existing audiences and invite past attendees.

guest.title: Guest Management
guest.content: Control attendance with approval systems, capacity limits, and waitlists. Set custom fields for registration and send automated reminders.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.content: Track page views, ticket sales, and engagement metrics. Get detailed insights on attendance patterns, revenue, and community growth.
